paper_abstract: In this paper we propose and implement numerical methods to detect exponential dichotomy on the real line. Our algorithms are based on the singular value decomposition and the QR factorization of a fundamental matrix solution. The theoretical justification for our methods was laid down in the companion paper: "Exponential Dichotomy on the real line: SVD and QR methods.".
paper_title: Detecting exponential dichotomy on the real line: SVD and QR algorithms
